amendment.description: To limit the use of funds to allocate the rate of price support between the purchase prices for nonfat dry milk and butter in a manner that does not support the price of milk at the rate prescribed by law.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2080 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2080 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S13997; text: CR S13997) To limit the use of funds to allocate the rate of price support between the purchase prices for nonfat dry milk and butter in a manner that does not support the price of milk at the rate prescribed by law.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2080 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2080 proposed by Senator Specter.
